name: Chaos Factory (NaSpokojnieTeam, KnajFi, Hackerman, Baxing, Attu)
name_original: Chaos Factory (NaSpokojnieTeam, KnajFi, Hackerman, Baxing, Attu)
description:
Warning: The version running in your browser may not work properly. We recommend downloading the windows version if you have the option.

One of the CHA0S-type robots, built to annihilate humanity, escapes from the space factory where it was created.

How to play?

By throwing objects in weightless mode, trigger or disable traps so the robot can pass.

Select an item from the list, place it in the purple box.
Click and drag the LMB to specify the speed and direction.
Click [Play] or enter to make the objects move.

Robot control:
Walking - AD or arrow keys
Jump - Space

Programming: Hackerman, Attu
Graphics: Rutek, KnajFi
Design: Baxing
Music: Phantores
